page.title: 13TEENAGERS IN BACKWELL
page.content: Backwell has only a few activities for teenagers. They consist of Youth Clubs, Guides, Scouts and Rangers . At weekends many teenagers go out of Backwell for their entertainment,but some prefer to stay and go to Backwell Leisure Centre,swimming ,playing Squash, Badminton and Tennis. In school holidays Backwell holds a Summer Festival.Every June there is an event at Backwell Lake called the Ponderama. You have a disadvantage if you live in the centre of Backwell . There is not a lot of things for teenagers to do in the evening .Very rarely the W.I holds a disco . There are four churches in Backwell,in which some teenagers attend. There aren't any clothes shops in Backwell so a lot of people leave Backwell to shop elsewhere .
